name: Day At The Museum (ejmaster7)
description:
You're a caveman in a exhibit at a museum. Suddenly an ancient magical artifact starts bringing the exhibits back to life! You see a T REX Skeleton Exhibit and it is controlling the artifact! Only you can stop the TREX and get the ancient power for yourself! You must arm yourself with helpful items and weapons in the museum to stop him!

Not all assets and game mechanics were able to be completed in time for the Jam, but we did our best! You can't beat the game or use the left click attack unfortunately, but you can run up to the dinosaur and die! Thanks for playing :)

The Download is a Unity File

How to Play: 

WASD to Move

Left Click to Attack

Mouse to move camera

E to pick up items

Credits:
